comments.content: I was just about to share the same link and you beat me to it. Looks like a neat book. Can be pre-ordered on [amazon](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430223929/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1596434252/comingupforai-20)

Who is the music by on that video? Sounds a bit like the Andrew sisters.

Sharon
